title: Which company do you think is currently set up for greater future success, Apple or Samsung? - Quora

response.answer_text: Currently, apple, but who knows, of they make silly decisions next year will obviously change. Apple has a smaller market share, but way, way, way more loyal customers. Apple customers love the brand almost more than the product.  Apple also has way more control over their hardware and software. However, Samsung has given people what they want.... Whereas, as Steve jobs famously said, people don't know what they want....

Probably Samsung, Apple is taking away more features on iPhones every year, or just doing nothing new, look at the difference between an iPhone 7 and 8, the difference between the two, is so small, you will need to really dive deep. Apple only makes electronics, while Samsung is split into many companies, more than I can remember, There are many sources of income for Samsung, than there is Apple.
